DOC.brief_summary: Examination of the bone conduction of persons which according to the pure tone audiogram have a normal age related hearing threshold in the air conduction.
DOC.brief_title: Age Dependence of Audiometric Bone Conduction Threshold in Normal Hearing Subjects
DOC.criteria: All pure tone audiograms recorded and available in the system from the beginning of measurement as follows: age related normal hearing threshold level with air conducted pure tone audiogram age younger than 20 years if inclusion criteria not given
